channel.title: Homepages on Chee Wei Tan's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Homepages on Chee Wei Tan's Homepage

item.title: Home Content
item.description: Dr. Tan received the M.A and Ph.D. degrees in Electrical Engineering from Princeton University. He is currently with College of Computing and Data Science, Nanyang Technological University in Singapore. He was a postdoctoral scholar in the NetLab Group at Caltech, a senior fellow for Science at Extreme Scales program at the Institute for Pure and Applied Mathematics at UCLA, and was a visiting faculty at Tencent AI Lab and Qualcomm R&D (QRC). His research interests are distributed optimization, Generative AI, networks and edge learning. His Erdös number is 3.
